channel.title: CVE Feed for busybox -- busybox
channel.description: The latest CVEs for busybox -- busybox

item.title: CVE-2021-42374|2024-08-04T03:30:38.452Z -- busybox -- busybox
item.description: An out-of-bounds heap read in Busybox's unlzma applet leads to information leak and denial of service when crafted LZMA-compressed input is decompressed. This can be triggered by any applet/format that

item.title: CVE-2021-42381|2024-08-04T03:30:38.442Z -- busybox -- busybox
item.description: A use-after-free in Busybox's awk applet leads to denial of service and possibly code execution when processing a crafted awk pattern in the hash_init function

item.title: CVE-2021-42379|2024-08-04T03:30:38.266Z -- busybox -- busybox
item.description: A use-after-free in Busybox's awk applet leads to denial of service and possibly code execution when processing a crafted awk pattern in the next_input_file function

item.title: CVE-2021-42386|2024-08-04T03:30:38.449Z -- busybox -- busybox
item.description: A use-after-free in Busybox's awk applet leads to denial of service and possibly code execution when processing a crafted awk pattern in the nvalloc function

item.title: CVE-2021-42382|2024-08-04T03:30:38.251Z -- busybox -- busybox
item.description: A use-after-free in Busybox's awk applet leads to denial of service and possibly code execution when processing a crafted awk pattern in the getvar_s function

item.title: CVE-2021-42384|2024-08-04T03:30:38.277Z -- busybox -- busybox
item.description: A use-after-free in Busybox's awk applet leads to denial of service and possibly code execution when processing a crafted awk pattern in the handle_special function

item.title: CVE-2021-42378|2024-08-04T03:30:38.552Z -- busybox -- busybox
item.description: A use-after-free in Busybox's awk applet leads to denial of service and possibly code execution when processing a crafted awk pattern in the getvar_i function

item.title: CVE-2021-42373|2024-08-04T03:30:38.267Z -- busybox -- busybox
item.description: A NULL pointer dereference in Busybox's man applet leads to denial of service when a section name is supplied but no page argument is given

item.title: CVE-2021-42385|2024-08-04T03:30:38.291Z -- busybox -- busybox
item.description: A use-after-free in Busybox's awk applet leads to denial of service and possibly code execution when processing a crafted awk pattern in the evaluate function

item.title: CVE-2021-42383|2024-08-04T03:30:38.425Z -- busybox -- busybox
item.description: A use-after-free in Busybox's awk applet leads to denial of service and possibly code execution when processing a crafted awk pattern in the evaluate function

item.title: CVE-2021-42376|2024-08-04T03:30:38.515Z -- busybox -- busybox
item.description: A NULL pointer dereference in Busybox's hush applet leads to denial of service when processing a crafted shell command, due to missing validation after a \x03 delimiter character. This may be used for DoS under very rare conditions of filtered command input.

item.title: CVE-2021-42377|2024-08-04T03:30:38.349Z -- busybox -- busybox
item.description: An attacker-controlled pointer free in Busybox's hush applet leads to denial of service and possible code execution when processing a crafted shell command, due to the shell mishandling the &&& string. This may be used for remote code execution under rare conditions of filtered command input.

item.title: CVE-2021-42380|2024-08-04T03:30:38.349Z -- busybox -- busybox
item.description: A use-after-free in Busybox's awk applet leads to denial of service and possibly code execution when processing a crafted awk pattern in the clrvar function

item.title: CVE-2021-42375|2024-08-04T03:30:38.275Z -- busybox -- busybox
item.description: An incorrect handling of a special element in Busybox's ash applet leads to denial of service when processing a crafted shell command, due to the shell mistaking specific characters for reserved characters. This may be used for DoS under rare conditions of filtered command input.
